original_title: Litro Reduces LP Gas Prices with effect from Wednesday (3) night
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); LP gas prices will be reduced with effect from midnight on Wednesday (3), said Litro Gas.
700 dengue cases recorded in three days; Dengue High Risk Zones declared
Draft bill on National Policy Commission to be tabled in parliament soon by Sub-Committee led by Namal
